description:
scaleupROM is a scalable, physics-constrained reduced order model (ROM). It aims to provide robust,
accelerated physics predictions at extrapolated scales, based on the small, component-level data. This is
implemented by combining projection-based ROM with discontinuous Galerkin domain decomposition, in
the framework of MFEM and libROM. It currently supports the Poisson equation and Stokes flow
equation, and more work is in progress toward general, nonlinear physics systems.
name: Scalable Reduced Order Model with Discontinuous Galerkin Domain Decomposition
